name: Flying Doggy
description:
Doggy doesn't like birds.
The birds always are teasing Doggy and run away.
Doggy want to pursue them but he can't fly.

One day, Doggy dreamed about flying in the sky.
Doggy can fly in his dream!
Now is the time to catch the birds!

- simple one button game
- eating the birds smaller than Doggy, avoiding the birds bigger than Doggy
- Doggy will grow when he eats the birds
- many kinds of birds
- level up by completing a Game Center achievement
- increase earning score points by level up
- 5 Game Center leaderboards
- outstanding graphics
